descriptionHtml:
Attention: UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL THIS BE UPLOADED TO STEAM WORKSHOP AND NO ONE REQUESTING PERMISSION TO DO SO WILL RECEIVE IT. THIS STATEMENT OVERRIDES ANYTHING IN THE PERMISSIONS POPUP THAT IS AVAILABLE ON NEXUS THAT CONFLICTS WITH THIS STATEMENT.


I made this because I noticed that the vanilla snow was a bit... blocky at times in screenshots. It\'s not a vast improvement, but it does look better in screen shots. There are two version, which I will show in the screenshots. The main version is lighter overall snow amounts without anything in the way of visual problems (as far as I have seen.), whereas the snowstorm looks amazing (in my opinion) in the alternate, but the light snowflakes that are larger have this odd squared aspect to them. I\'m not sure why...

Installation:

Pick your file of choice, download with NMM, install, and you are good to go.

-OR-

Pick your file of choice and drag the textures folder in the archive into the Data folder.

Try my other mods:

Dragon Auras: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9815
Dragon Skins: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9888
Improved Rain: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11063
Orcish Armor Color Fix: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10720
author: Sepherose
